items.title: Studio Headshot
items.value: Professional studio headshot of person, corporate outfit key light and fill light creating a balanced exposure. Clean, grey background, 50mm lens for a natural look, confident stance with arms crossed, looking directly at the camera.

items.title: B&W Photo
items.value: a black and white photo of person wearing a sleek white balenciaga coat, trending on instagram. posed against a stark, minimalist backdrop for a high-fashion editorial feel

items.title: Turtleneck
items.value: silicon valley photo of person, detailed threads black turtleneck top, Poised and confident demeanor. in front of flat color background.

items.title: Yellow
items.value: character portrait, laughing, yellow clothes, smiling person, in front of an orange background
